item.description:
Hi everyone,

I will be biking over from Lincoln with the biking group. We should be there no later than 11am. My cell is 508-472-7900. Bring snacks if you wish. I plan on being there for at least a couple of hours so come early or come late. It's $5 for parking or $35 for a season pass.
item.name: Walden Pond Swimming/walking/sunning
